description: Least term in period of continued fraction for sqrt(n) is 33.
links: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
prog: (PARI) Vec(-x*(1087*x+1091)/(x-1)^3 + O(x^100)) \\ _Colin Barker_, Apr 22 2015(MAGMA) [n*(1089*n + 2): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2015
